item.description: featuring Dr. Caldwell Esselstyn and Dr. Joel Fuhrman, respectively. Free and open to the public. Light vegan refreshments will be served. Discussion afterwards. For more information, email facilitator JohnABall@verizon.net or call him at 978-456-3552. Part of a film series on nutrition and health with a plant-based diet.
item.name: 2 films: "No More Heart Attacks--Ever” and “Say No to Heart Disease & Diabetes"
